name: Solcre Technology Solutions
tagline: WE CREATE, DEVELOP AND FOSTER NEW CONCEPTS.
description:
In 2007 we created Solcre, a company which originally focused on the development of websites and applications. As the web continued to expand, our clients’ demands for more comprehensive solutions also increased. This is how we became a digital agency.
Given the industry demands, we expanded our range of services and began developing games, mobile and social media apps, online internet campaigns and audiovisual products to satisfy our clients’ demands.
